1553460.name: Rated Mutant
1553460.description:
Tori’s life is turned upside when her father is kidnapped. Rappelling deeper into what she once believed was an abandoned laboratory she begins to find herself fighting against hordes of monstrous creatures, fighting not only for her own life but her father’s as well. Discover the secrets of the lab and uncover the truth beyond the mysterious “V”.

Features



  • Side-Scrolling Platformer Action - Rated Mutant is a high energy action-platformer, navigate around environmental hazards, run, dash and dodge enemy attacks. Return fire with a barrage of short and long range weapons. Hot swap your weapons and switch your techniques to gain an advantage over your foes, as enemies will adjust and adapt.

  • Uncover Secrets - Travel down the road less traveled and reveal secret passageways and mutants, always something new to find.

  • Epic Boss Battles - Experience battles as unorthodox as the creatures themselves, with tough but satisfying combat.

  • Rogues Gallery - Discover over 30 unique monsters, defeat them to unlock new information and lore.

  • Master Weapons - Unlock new weapons, and new ways to use them as you continue your descent.

  • Custom Soundtrack - Rated Mutant features a modern soundtrack, designed to fit its action packed game play and chilling atmosphere.
1553460.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 丹麦语, 日语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
